;

;Igor ·Amir is still in prison. He is 53 years old and has been in prison for nearly thirty years. In the past ten years, lawyers have repeatedly applied for him to have his sentence commuted or even released from prison, but each time he was rejected. From November 4, 1995 to the present, many extreme things have passed away, and the title of "the most dangerous person" in Israel still belongs to him.

;

;Amir fired three shots with a semi-automatic pistol, staining Prime Minister Rabin's blood red that day. At that time, Rabin attended a rally in Tel Aviv's Kings Square. After speaking, he was about to get into his car when he was shot twice and his bodyguard was also wounded. After Rabin's death, King's Square was renamed Isaac Rabin Square. Even now when I walk there, I still have a strange feeling: not because I am immersed in sadness, but because of the monument in the square commemorating Rabin. The sculpture looks so strange: it looks like a pyramid frame composed of three huge triangular wooden fences, with the tip pointed to the ground, and it is all rusty red.

;

;;

;

;Orthodox Jewish ghettos are often messy and quiet, but this is where the hearts of the fanatical believers belong. ;(Yun Ye Tui/Picture);

;

;Previously from 1993 to 1995, Amir completed his compulsory military service and was among the best in Israel. He studied law and computers at Bar-Ilan University. During this period, Israel, under the leadership of Prime Minister Rabin, negotiated peace with Arafat, the leader of the Palestine Liberation Organization, and signed the Oslo Accords. The conciliatory gesture angered the country's extreme right wing. Amir and his brother were both extreme right wingers and conspired to kill Rabin. In 1996, Amir was sentenced to life imprisonment, and the bodyguard who was injured outside was sentenced to six years. His brother Haggai was sentenced to 16 years in prison. After the arrival of the new century, the left-wing parties led by Rabin and Shimon Peres gradually declined. The right-wing has long occupied the leadership position in Israeli politics, but Amir has never been released from prison. However, after 2003, a Russian-Jewish woman named Larisa Trumpovler kept visiting him in prison. The two got married in 2005, and two years later, they got the child of love through in vitro fertilization, named Yi Nong. Amir has never been released from prison, and their union and offspring were all carried out with approval.

;

;In 2003, when Larissa first started dating Amir, a 77-year-old man named Herz Frank followed her with a camera. Frank is a Jewish citizen who immigrated to Israel from Latvia in 1993. When Larissa appeared, he seemed to realize that the thing he most wanted to do in life had appeared. He wanted to find out about Amir, the man everyone talked about. How did the perverted and terrifying prisoner come to associate with Larissa? What’s more, I want to know what motivation Larissa had to plunge into a hair-raising and absurd love, waiting for someone who would be impossible to return to freedom under normal circumstances. man.

;

;This is an absolutely public personal act, and he also obtained the permission of Larissa and other relevant personnel. Ten years later, Herz Frank died. His Russian friend Kravchenko obtained the video materials he shot and spent another two years making a documentary called "Beyond Fear (;or "Beyond the Fear", Beyond the Fear;)》. The film is dedicated to Herz Frank, and it mainly presents his shooting experience. He also appears in more places than Amir and Larissa, but the killer Amir’s sinister expression is impossible for viewers to miss. , which is also the "selling point" of the film.

;

;All of this content is information that can be searched and compiled, including the public opinion disputes that arose when the film was released. Amir is still in solitary confinement and is prohibited from using communication tools. His brother had some conciliatory words after his release from prison, but Larissa and the rest of Amir's family have always refused to apologize for his actions. They just hate Rabin and the "Oslo System", but now that Amir has become a father, Larissa has pushed this love story as far as they can.

;

;;

;

;Igor Amir;（云也 retreat/图）;

;

;Rabin His death was a huge wound for Israel. He was deeply loved by the people of Israel. He was self-denial and devoted to public service throughout his life. After his death, he had only a meager birth. Israel has designated November 14th as the anniversary of Rabin’s assassination. Every year on this day, the Labor Party led by Rabin organizes an organization to commemorate him. The crowds at rallies always look back on the past and express their sorrow with silent solemnity. Every year passes. , the speeches of the labor leaders became increasingly concise, no longer talking about the original details in detail, saying only that "we are proud to be members of Rabin's party" and "we will continue to fight to bring the country on the road to peaceful dialogue." ".

;

;The left has been in a slump. Even if no one dares to take the initiative to release Amir, right-wing parties have always controlled the political situation and used their tough external voices to prevent people from having any illusions about peace again.

;

;There are more things, things that are more important than the ins and outs of the Palestinian-Israeli conflict that anyone can say a few words about, are being ignored. It’s a feeling of exhaustion from thinking and feeling. Every Israeli citizen who looks healthy and sunny is fighting some shadows; every young parent will shrink his smile when thinking about his children having to serve in the compulsory military service in the future; every young and handsome man who looks like he blends in with the tourists The soldiers all have a lot to tell about being attacked, bombed, and killed in action. The relationship between security and danger is not just an opponent, but a neighbor. This seemed to be a foregone conclusion when the Israeli army retook Jerusalem and occupied the West Bank and Gaza through the "Six-Day War". A poem by Yehuda Amichai best expresses this tension:

;

;;"In the old days On the roof of a house in the city;

;

;;The washed clothes are hung to dry in the afternoon sun:;

;

;;The white sheets of a woman who is my enemy,;

;

; ;Used by a man who is my enemy;

;

;;A towel wiping the sweat off his forehead.";

;

;People who are "enemies of me" all lead normal lives. The peaceful forces have always emphasized this and have always wanted people to realize this, but the main militant faction has used the opposite narrative: Those who live a normal life are always hostile to me. In Israel, there is a stone erected on the roadside. The Hebrew words on it are about an explosion on a certain day of a certain year. You will know when you see several candle niches on a wall and long-withered garlands on the ground. A shocking and horrific incident occurred there. If there were toys, it would indicate that there were children among the dead. Not to mention that there are various memorial facilities related to the Nazi Holocaust of the last century. Some of them are just a photo wall or a name wall, which you will encounter if you are not paying attention. After various encounters, you will feel that such a small country accommodates too much sadness.

;

;But Israelis will tell you that the worst enemies come from within ourselves.

;

;;

;

;This is a sculpture commemorating a group of Israeli soldiers who were killed in a suicide attack. Among the many stele sculptures in Israel, it is one of the few with a relatively "high-profile" shape. ;（云也 retreat/图）;

;

;;“Enough blood and tears”;

; < p>;There are no memorial buildings in Israel that can only be admired from a distance and cannot be approached. In Rabin Square, people can walk casually under the big triangle and pass through the shadows cast by the frames on the ground on a sunny day. Some children who are good at climbing on the fence.

;

;It is impossible to see the meaning of this sculpture at a glance, and there is no unified explanation. Just as people's views, opinions, and attitudes towards Rabin's death are too diverse to form any natural consensus. Rabin is a good man, and in a 2006 national opinion poll in Israel, he was more revered than founding father David Ben-Gurion and topped the list of "most beloved Israeli Jews." He was also an outstanding soldier. As Chief of Staff of the National Defense Forces, he played a major role in the victory of the "Six-Day War" in 1967. He was also an excellent diplomat. After the war, he proposed to the then Prime Minister Levi Eshkol to be the ambassador to the United States. Eshkol thought he had heard wrongly. The prime minister was famous for his humor and he was very fond of Latin America. Bing said: "What? You say you want to stand in those long cocktail parties and sit in those annoying banquets? Are you willing to play those boring diplomatic games that diplomats have to play?"< /p>;

;;

;

;Rabbin in his youth;（云也 retreat/Picture）;

;

;But Rabin wanted to What's more, the heightened hostility in the Arab world after the disastrous defeat of the "Six-Day War" will inevitably make Israel face a greater threat. The world was split in half during the Cold War. The Soviet Union stood behind the Arab countries. During the "Six-Day War", Syria, Egypt and Jordan all relied on Soviet arms. So whose support should Israel seek? Of course it's the United States. Eshkol knew very well that Rabin, who never spoke any official language, became an ambassador for the benefit of the country. After Nixon won the election, Rabin often traveled with the newly appointed Secretary of State Henry Kissinger and became a celebrity in the White House. Not only that, as a core figure of the left-wing Labor Party, he also told his political opponent, the right-wing leader May Nachem Begin said how important diplomacy is to the country: When I do diplomatic work, I must use the adversarial relationship between the Democratic and Republican parties to promote Israel's interests, otherwise I might as well pack up and leave.

;

;;

;

;Rabin and Clinton;（云也 retreat/Picture）;

;

;The close relationship between the United States and Israel It goes without saying how important connections are to Israel. However, after the 1986 Palestinian uprising known as the first "Intifada" in history, Rabin gradually realized that when the "Six-Day War" enabled the country to take over the West Bank, Gaza and Jerusalem, it also took away these lands. The 1.7 million Palestinians brought in together. What to do with these people? What are their identities?

;

;At that time, Rabin was the defense minister. He convened a group of left-wing writers and poets to learn about the situation of the Palestinians. Among these literati are Oz, AB Yehoshua, and David Grossman. They all believe that blindly ignoring the existence of Palestinians will make the country never have peace. Yehoshua often said with pride afterwards: No head of state would consult a writer on national policy. Rabin joked many times: Every Israeli is teaching me how to be prime minister.

;

;;

;

;Grossman, AB Yehoshua, and Amos Oz are the iron triangle of Israeli left-wing writers. ;(Yun Yehui/Picture);

;

;From then to the signing of the Oslo Accords in 1994, Rabin firmly transformed from a war hero Transformed into a peacemaker. In August 1993, Rabin stood side by side with Arafat at the White House and delivered a famous speech entitled "Enough Blood and Tears, Enough." After that, the management power of the West Bank and Gaza Strip was considered to be Officially handed over to the Palestinian Authority. Looking back at that time, people may think that "land for peace" was indeed the aspiration of the people in Israel at that time, but in fact, from the conclusion of the Oslo Accords to November 4, 1995, the Israelis were completely divided and targeted Protests and petitions against Rabin and the peace agreement continue one after another, month after month; even a bystander who knows nothing about Middle East affairs and only subconsciously agrees with "peace" will realize that this country Something serious has gone wrong.

;

;Every anti-Rabin person regards himself as the master of the country, and what he says is usually intellectual. Those far-right Jews who have occupied a settlement in the desolate West Bank are only "abominable" and "unreasonable" in the eyes of rational people, but they are not "ignorant". Everyone has knowledge and can defend their position eloquently. If a person holds a Bible in his hand and talks about the relationship between the Jewish nation and this land for three thousand years, you will definitely feel that he is very knowledgeable. On the other hand, another person, such as Shlomo Sander, the author of the "Fictional Trilogy" and a professor at Tel Aviv University, opened his mouth to refute the various narratives accumulated around the "Holy Land" and argue that "Semiticism" His origins and debunking the myths created by Zionism in the past hundred years, you will definitely be convinced by him, and perhaps deeply moved by his courage.

;

;The atmosphere of debate can be seen everywhere and can be felt since childhood. Children who grow up here learn early on that politics is not a "meat-eater's plan" but an urgent matter, and any stone with something written on it is a reminder to people to think about something. A person's habit of having an opinion on everything stems not only from the spiritual tradition accumulated by ancient scriptures and scripture interpretations, but also due to the "oppression" of the public opinion atmosphere. A person must not only form and demonstrate his own position, but also try to refute it. Seemingly profound philosophical creeds such as "the opposite is the movement of the Tao" are often just common sense in practice here.

;

;However, politics is not a mental exercise. It requires people to take a stand. As a result of the peace talks and agreements, the atmosphere of hostility suddenly escalated. The official order to withdraw from the occupied territories ignited the hatred of the Jewish settlers there towards the Palestinians, and also made them full of anger towards the Israeli soldiers who came to dismantle the settlements. The confrontation between Israeli military police and black-robed Jews produced many photos that can be recorded in the history of photojournalism. They not only showed the extreme anger of extreme fanatics, but also engraved the internal divisions of a country where everyone is patriotic. Martin Gilbert tells the story of the first extreme suicide attack after the Oslo Accords in "History of Israel": On January 22, 1995, 20 Israeli soldiers were killed in a series of explosions near Netanya. Die, that's the work of jihadist groups - no party seems to be satisfied with "peace," and dissatisfaction can easily escalate into violence.

;

;;

;

;Common expressions of Palestinian boys in the West Bank. ;(Yun Yehui/Picture);

;

;Rabin used countless speeches to convince the people of the need for peace, but for the warring faction , the peace faction is always surrendering, ruining the future of the nation, and all the contributions Rabin has made to the country in the past can be wiped out. Does he understand this? Did he have a premonition that he was shot minutes after his last speech?

;

;I feel more and more that Rabin’s death was a self-sacrifice: he had been willing to go among the people all his life, not guarding against the crowds surrounding him, and facing them with his shy and blushing face. Eyes of love or hatred. He probably understood that only his own blood could temporarily appease the excited emotions of all parties and interrupt the peace project he was trying to create, perhaps based on fantasy. He must use his own ending to serve as a warning to future generations: He would rather fight to the death with foreign enemies, and would rather spend hundreds of millions of dollars to build the most technologically advanced national defense system, than do so within the country (;To be precise, it is to cultivate enemies within the Jewish people;) and stimulate those who have different political views to take action with weapons.

;

;;

;

;In the Old City of Jerusalem, you can see many people who do not seem to belong to the "Jewish state" of Israel. From this, you may have an idea of ​​the meaning of the "Holy City" comprehended. ;(Yun Yehui/Picture);

;

;;"He is a tragedy";

;

; There are many tragedies caused by "historical issues" that will fade away with the passage of time. The most typical ones are the riots and wars in Algeria that started in 1952 and ended twelve years later, and the war in Afghanistan that started in 1979. It also lasted for ten years. These past events seem to have been turned over, and salvaging them is also the work of some writers and researchers who believe in humanitarianism. In particular, the pain they caused at that time was not universal. For many French and Russians, Tragic things are far beyond one's perception.

;

;But in Israel, where the space is small, and in the ancient city where the enemy is drying laundry opposite one's home, nothing will really turn the page; events are always current events, not a repeat or replica of what happened back then. Prepared for it: prepared for calm to enter the bomb shelter, prepared for sadness at the news of the killings.

;

;Shlomo Sander once told me that the direct impetus for him to write "The Fictional Jewish Nation" was his sympathy for the situation of Palestinian students who were struggling in this country. Lack of "at home"; Sander deeply understands their pain. In this book, he demonstrates that the Palestinians who were driven out at that time are the true descendants of the ancient Israelites in the "biblical era". He also said that the apartment where his home is located was a Palestinian village before the establishment of the state of Israel and had its own Arabic name.

;

;Of course Sander will not take the lead in exiting his own house. He was just doing what a scholar should do. Although he has endured attacks, reviles and even life threats from his enemies on the right, Sander is not alone. In Israel, he and others of all stripes continued to think, write, and publish.

;

;Democracy is also the biggest concession that Israel has made for its "occupied" land. In other "one land, two peoples" cases, horrific ethnic cleansing has occurred, but not in Israel; despite Zygmunt Bauman's sneer that there can be no enlightenment as long as there is occupation, Israel has sent troops in the past When suppressing Palestinian unrest, tanks were never fired at surrounding crowds. Tragedies have occurred when countries such as Syria, Jordan, and Algeria suppressed rebellions. Making this kind of comparison now feels a bit "excessive", but it is also different now than before.

;

;;

;

;Israeli mother and child;（云也 retreat/Picture）;

;

;There is a " The "Impossible Triangle" stands at the center of Israeli politics, with its three corners being land, security and democracy. Israel has wanted all three since 1967, but in fact it can only get two: if it wants land and democracy, it means sacrificing security; if it wants democracy and security, it must give up land; if it wants security and land, it Democracy must be abandoned, that is, the civil rights of non-Jewish people in the current population must be denied, and all voices of internal and external dissatisfaction must be silenced. This triangle can be used to explain the strange sculpture commemorating Prime Minister Rabin: Rabin decided to give up the land for the sake of security and democracy, and died here.

;

;Let people freely "pass" the unstable inverted triangle and feel its meaning. This design also reflects the principle of democracy. When talking about Rabin with older Israelis, they will all say, "He is a tragedy." But what kind of tragedy it is, and what is right and wrong, they won't say. It’s not that they dare not say it, but that they have long accepted all arguments about it. This is their way of understanding the tragedy and then moving on. Life is about "passing" every event and moment to form your own experience and your own thinking.

;

;;

;

;Karavan's work "The Road to Peace";（云也 retreat/图）;

;

;The sculptor Dani Karavan, who died two years ago, created many profound works in Israel’s deserts, cities and borders. At the junction of Israel and Egypt, he used a hundred columns to make a "peace road" for people to walk through and feel how many ethnic groups have walked this road for thousands of years. It should not be closed, it should continue to be open. . In Poteb, on the border of France and Spain, the sculpture Caravan designed to commemorate the suicide of the Jewish thinker Walter Benjamin is called "Passages".

;Fang Junrui, the protagonist of the documentary "The Nest", initially took the initiative to walk up to the director Qin Xiaoyue. In 2016, at the screening of Qin Xiaoyue's first film "The World and Me", Fang Junrui stayed until the end, blushing and stammering, telling Qin Xiaoyue that he wanted to restore cultural relics, but reality did not allow it.

;

;Looking at this peer who was a bit socially anxious and stuttered, Qin Xiaoyue noticed that there was a strong dramatic tension in his expression. Fang Junrui said that doing cultural relic restoration work requires a certain financial foundation. He feels that his family's conditions are not enough to support him, but at the same time, he is also very proud that his family has a house next to Jing'an Temple in Shanghai.

;

;Qin Xiaoyue and the photographer entered the family with cameras. It was a 30-square-meter husband's house, where Jun Rui, born in 1985, lived with his parents, who were over 70 years old. The largest room is the living room, which is also Fang Junrui's bedroom. It has a bed, a dining table, and a recliner for his father to watch TV. Fang Junrui kept buying books on art, religion, and literature, filling the gaps in the furniture.

;

;;

;

;Differences in concepts and dependence in life are the daily life of Fang Junrui (middle) and his parents. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;Fang Junrui was deeply influenced by his father who loved calligraphy and painting. When he was in college, he chose cultural relics. Professional restoration. After graduation, the father and son discovered that this was an industry that required high academic qualifications and strong financial support. In the two years after graduating in 2014, Fang Junrui not only failed to find a suitable job, but none of the other jobs he found lasted more than three months.

;

;Father continued to support Fang Junrui, helped him pay the high tuition fees, and signed up for a master class in cultural relic restoration. Fang Junrui took it intermittently and also repaired a bowl, but he never finished it. Constantly hitting the wall swallowed up Fang Junrui's hope. He fell into depression and melancholy, indulged in pure fantasy, and lived a life that was reversed day and night.

;

;Fang Junrui’s father did not live the life he wanted when he was young. He liked painting, but failed to make it a career; he wrote good poems and articles, but he was depressed for a long time.

;

;Qin Xiaoyue originally planned to film the mental journey of a boy who loves the restoration of cultural relics. But as soon as she stepped into their home, she felt that this expectation was completely disappointed. The camera was like a match, igniting the conflicts they had suppressed for many years. In the first few shoots, apart from quarrels, there was almost nothing captured. The direction of the film has completely changed.

;

;At a post-screening talk in Guangzhou on September 16, 2023, an audience member asked about the reason for the naming of "The Nest". In his understanding, "The Nest" is closer to people's imagination of a beautiful family, but The film shows a trapped family, which reminded him of a "cage."

;

; "The nest is not only the feeling of a very warm family, but also the feeling of always living under the wings of the parents, and the expectation that he will always fantasize about when he can leave the nest." Qin Xiaoyue responded. , "His spiritual world is also a nest. He used these books to build a nest for his spiritual world, which is in great contrast with the nest in the real world."

;

;;

;

;Thirty Fang Junrui, who is many years old, lives with his parents, who are over 70 years old, in an old house of 30 square meters. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;Liu Wenrong, a researcher at the Shanghai Academy of Social Sciences, has been investigating the intergenerational dynamics of Chinese society for more than ten years Regarding relationship issues, in her opinion, "The Nest" shows typical family intergenerational relationships during the transition period: "Although parents are very unhappy, in fact, the children in this structure are also very unhappy. The reason why everyone resonates is Because the film reflects the current common dilemma of young people growing up, they all feel that they have a strong pursuit of self-realization but are powerless. From a sociological perspective, this phenomenon is a phenomenon unique to us when modernization and social development have reached a certain stage. The result of the intergenerational solidarity culture of familism and the culture of parent-child integration."

;

;Triangle

;

;When photographing this family, Qin Xiao wanted to explore more and more, the people living under the same roof Although they clearly hurt and tortured each other, what allowed them to continue living together. In an interview with a reporter from Southern Weekend, she revealed her answer: "Maybe they have very little and only have each other. If they throw away even this, they will have nothing."

;

;The three of them rarely go out. When traveling, your social circle is also narrow. Except for the occasional visit by her mother to visit relatives, most of the time they spend all day in each other's home. Qin Xiaoyue described this family as a "stable triangular structure", "everyone is dependent and tortured."

;

;The negative attitude common in East Asian families is passed down from generation to generation. Fang Junrui's grandfather was imprisoned for offending a prison guard when he was young, and his father looked down upon him very much. During the "Cultural Revolution", his father encountered the "Going to the Countryside Movement" and needed to go to the frontier. As soon as the mobilization people came, he ran away, forming a Fang Junrui also looked down on his father because of his evasive and fearful temperament.

;

;My father often communicated with Fang Junrui in a suppressive way. When Fang Junrui complained that he could not find his ideal job, his father would say that he had suffered so many injustices and the conditions were so difficult, but he still came through and still insisted on painting. He accused his son of not working hard and only sleeping all day long. , don’t fight for it. Fang Junrui talked about his reading scope and said that sculpture is also one of the areas of interest. His father started by saying: "Sculpture? Do you know sculpture? What do you know?"

;

;This made Fang Junrui in The already cramped home made him feel even more suffocated. He collapsed several times in front of the camera and even threatened to commit suicide.

;

;But at the same time, the care in life is meticulous. Every month, Fang Junrui can get 3,000 yuan from his father. When he needs it, food and clean towels will always be handed to him. When the unpacked books are thrown on the ground, someone will help pick them up. Despite the suffering, Fang Junrui never chose to leave his parents and live alone.

;

;After watching "The Nest", someone shared his understanding with Qin Xiaoyue: The father has never had a sense of presence in society, so he has to make up for it in educating his son. He tried to set rules for the cat he adopted at home, but the cat was not tamed after being beaten, and continued to pace calmly around the dinner table. Fang Junrui is also "immune" to his father's advice.

;

;Facing the camera, the mother does not have as strong a desire to express herself as the father and son. Most of the time, she silently takes care of the housework. The adopted cats came and went, and while the mother fed them food, she lovingly called each one by the name she had given them. "It seems that my mother has always been a person with infinite care, but she actually swallowed her grievances most of the time." Qin Xiaoyue remembered that later in the filming, perhaps because of the camera, Fang Junrui's mother confided all her grievances He came out and pointed at the camera, "Let them judge."

;

;Fang Junrui's mother angrily told her father and son that she wanted to leave them and travel by herself, but in the end she fell back on "If you don't go, I won't go."

;

;;

;

;Fang Junrui’s mother. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;In the film, Fang Junrui’s mother revealed a past incident. Fang Junrui went to junior high school. I once asked to raise a puppy, but my father didn't agree.她认为，自从这件事后，本来伶俐的儿子“脑子转不过来，坏掉了”。 40多岁的两人老来得子，对房君睿宠溺万分，尤其是父亲，对他从小几乎是有求必应。秦潇越猜测，在这件事上，房君睿未得到满足，不能站在其他人立场去考虑问题，不能接受父亲的拒绝，性情可能变得偏执。

;

;秦潇越有一个比她小十多岁的弟弟，也深受父母宠爱，她有时会以此警示父母。 “但我觉得从父母的角度来讲，有的时候好像也没办法，他们就是被自己的小孩拿捏。太在意一个人的时候你就不好掌控了，生活就会越来越失控，失控到一个无法解决的地步，然后痛苦地在一起。” 

;

;镜头的出现，让一家人把积压已久的情绪爆发出来，也暴露出在教育儿子的问题上父母截然不同的态度。房父还想借助镜头拉儿子一把，让他觉醒、改变，母亲则认为说了也没什么用，再在镜头前刺激他，只会更加让他想不开。在纪录片结尾，母亲说了一句，把老房子卖了，也够儿子吃一辈子。父母对于房君睿的态度像两股相向刮来的风，互相抵消了力量。

;

;房君睿辞掉保安工作后，去做空气检测。母亲向父亲嘀咕：“空气检测是不是要一直站着，会很辛苦。”父亲直言：“你这人好奇怪，一边担心他吃不了苦，现在又怕他吃苦。”

;

;“他在这样子的环境下很适应的，就这样自己做自己的，每天有人照顾他吃穿。关于觉不觉醒、人生的意义、生命的动力，这种很高谈阔论的东西落回到每一天的日程，就还是变成吃小馄饨，烧饭，一日三餐。”秦潇越对南方周末记者说。

;

;考虑到房君睿以后可能要结婚，二老在远离市中心的嘉定买了一套经济适用房。前不久，他们刚把房君睿的书搬到新房里去。秦潇越希望将来能拍下房君睿或他父母搬离老房子的镜头，那意味着，这个家庭的稳定结构极有可能出现突破口。

;

;两代人

;

;房家祖上曾拥有风光的昔日，民国时期，房君睿的曾祖父辈迁至沪上，开黄包车公司，做买办，过起了他人艳羡的生活。日军入侵上海时，他们家族从虹口逃难至苏州河沿岸，在波涛诡谲的时代几经浮沉，到房君睿父辈这代，彻底没落。

;

;与逼仄、灰暗的物理空间形成鲜明对比的，是这一家人的精神世界。父亲爱画画，会写近体诗，母亲也读繁体竖排的诗词，房君睿耳濡目染，承袭了对文史、艺术的兴趣。当初房君睿高考，还是父亲首先在报考专业中发现了“文物修复”。他把每个月的工资和父亲给的钱都用来买书，和教友谈起天主教中的文化艺术，头头是道。

;

;在秦潇越看来，房君睿与父亲的命运是“很雷同的，平行的”。房父从小喜欢画画，但没有机会从事相关工作，有二十年的时间，他在公共浴室做服务员。不过他始终没有放弃这份爱好，有时间就在家里画，当人才可以流动的时候，他跳槽到医院当美工，主要工作内容是出黑板报。一直等到40岁分配到了房子，他才开始考虑结婚生子。他常把类似的话挂在嘴边：“有多少人能真的过理想的生活？”

;

;不似父母那代人可以随遇而安，房君睿毫不掩饰自己“生不逢时”之感，他为自己坎坷的生活找到了一个怪罪的落脚点，幻想自己如果物质条件优渥，便可以从事文物修复，顺利结婚生子。

;

;在父亲的观念里，没有条件，没有房子的话，还谈什么朋友，结什么婚？而房君睿觉得，有房子住，可以结婚，是每个人都应该实现的基本需求。 “难道只有有钱人才能结婚吗？”

;

;;

;

;房君睿（右）与父亲（左）就个人遭遇争论。纪录片《巢》剧照。 ;（片方供图/图）;

;

;刘汶蓉分析：“父亲和他有相似的个人理想，对事业和审美、艺术的追求上有相同之处，但是因为成长的社会发展阶段不同，选择了不同的人生道路。父亲把生存放在第一位，儿子却在自我实现和理想追求道路上不妥协。他们这个巨大的冲突就是那些不团结的、不和谐的'啃老'家庭共同的特点——价值观上无法契合，两代人的工具性支持就成了情感捆绑、道德绑架。”

;

;这对父子在同年龄段遭遇相似的命运——由于各种因缘，他们都没能过上自己理想的生活。但两人之间并未惺惺相惜，反而筑起高墙。房父以自己的人生经历激励房君睿，后者完全不吃这一套，觉得没有什么了不起的。而在房父眼里，房君睿生活完全不能自理，文物修复只是好高骛远的空谈。

;

;秦潇越指出，房父经历过的动荡年代，把他的生活面貌、对于生活的感觉、整个内心秩序都摧残了。这导致他几乎所有认知、表达方式都是消极保守的。而房君睿与许多同代人一样，“没有经历过什么很大的痛苦，见证的是祖国发展最迅猛的阶段，而且受到很多外来文化影响，机遇也更多，看到的可能性更多，不太会为自己设限”。

;

;房君睿与父母最大的区别在于，后者的生活处境是不干活全家没饭吃，前者则吃饱穿暖，工作更多是为了自我实现。当房君睿的抱负无法在社会上得到施展时，他既不愿、也不能像父母那样埋首于生存，接受平庸琐碎的人生。

;

;80后、90后的生活质量远高于父母一代，是两代人成长环境的核心变化，也是代际冲突的源头。类似房君睿与父母，代际之间的隔阂与认知差异是普遍的。

;

;“沟通很重要。当沟通没到位的时候，可能就会出现他们家这种情况。感觉他们是出于爱去讲这些话，但是这些话又完全到不了对方心里，关系就架在那儿了。”秦潇越说。

;

;秦潇越也曾遭受过父母的否定。那时她从海外留学回来，坐火车环游中国，开始拍纪录片。在父母的想法里，女儿尝试过自己想做的了，就该老老实实找个班上，最好能进电视台、报社，稳定体面。不料后来秦潇越为《巢》折腾五六年，他们想不通女儿为何“又跳进了更大的坑”。后期制作时，她和父母起了矛盾，母亲对她说，“你再这样下去，也会变成房君睿的”。

;

;秦潇越回望这一路，家人点滴支持都靠自己争取，如果有这方面的成绩，最能够打消他们的担忧，还没有成绩出来时，至少要有热情、行动力打动他们。

;

;影片陆续在上海、广州、杭州等城市放映，每一场，秦潇越都会接收到观众直接的共鸣，诸如想起了自己父亲讲话的方式，某个朋友的家庭也与之相似等等。这正是她期望的——观众能跳出对人物的指指点点，把片子当成一面镜子去映照自己身上的问题。

;

;一只碗

;

;房君睿一直没有修好那只碗。

;

;第一次拍摄，父亲主动让他把碗展示给秦潇越他们看，鼓励他把这个碗修好，说不定大师觉得不错，愿意收他做关门弟子。

;

;第二次拍摄，父亲在镜头前“戳穿”房君睿——如果他真的喜欢文物修复的话，这个碗老早就修好了。秦潇越顺着这话说，下次等他把碗修好再过来拍。房君睿眼神一变，直接表示，不可能通过他拍一部励志片。

;

;;

;

;房君睿许久没有修好的那只碗。 ;（受访者供图/图）;

;

;这只小小的碗，房君睿为什么一直修不好，一名观众给出了心理学层面的理解：碗，对他来说是理想的象征，如果他不修，理想永远存在；如果他去修，没有修好，或者修完了，仍找不到与此相关的工作，那么他的理想就破灭了。

;

;《巢》的拍摄、制作周期远超秦潇越的计划。她觉得这部片子就是自己的那只碗。 “你很想要做一个事情，也很擅长做这个事情，但是你却一直没有做出来，这种时候你就会觉得你的人生好像是失控的，你的人生道路不是你想象的样子，就会产生一种自我质疑。”在她看来，片子做出来，挺偶然，如果没做出来，她也会陷入很无助的状态，“如果很确定地说这个事情我就不做了，赶快转行，可能也没有那么痛苦。”

;

;片子拿到Frist青年电影展最佳纪录片奖后，受到许多关注，其中不乏文物修复领域的工作者，秦潇越建议房君睿趁此机会把碗修好，好向关心他的人证明自己的能力。房君睿回应她，修好了又怎么样呢，而且自己现在完全没有时间。 “其实工作也是有双休日的，他完全是沉浸在负面情绪里走不出来。”秦潇越说。

;

;文物修复入行门槛高，通常需要读研，由导师引路。看过片子后，房君睿的大专同学告诉秦潇越，他们同学里，毕业后无人进入文物修复领域。房君睿尝试过包括房产登记、技术工人、医院安保等诸多工作，总是因工作能力、人际关系、个人意愿等原因难以持续。苦于收入与房子的问题，他也找不到对象。

;

;1970年代后期成长起来的刘汶蓉，观察到如今年轻人很难做到“脚踏实地”。这种心态的变化和整个社会信息环境密切相关，“网络、信息传播太发达，给人的无力感太强了——他参照的对象永远是最好的那一批人，没有办法对自己身边的人和事，包括对自己满意，活得非常不快乐”。

;

;房君睿想过上一种更好的生活，并想象那样的生活存在于祖上的光辉岁月里。但他看不到眼前停滞的生活在短期内有松动的可能，失去了行动力。四五年光阴在屏幕上淌过，直到影片结束，几乎没有任何一件事得到解决，没有修完碗，没有找到合适的工作，家庭关系没有缓和，没有恋爱结婚。

;

;在遇见房君睿之前，秦潇越相信，每个人都应该过自己想要的生活。他打破了她的期待，始终不曾成为一个英雄式的人物。在纠结许久之后，秦潇越接受了这种失落感，接受了任何人都可以是一个平庸的人。

;

;“我觉得像他爸说的没有错，你如果真的很热爱一个东西，其实是会去做更多尝试的，不会那么轻易地想要放弃，但是没有人可以真的做到感同身受，比如我现在这样说，对他来说是不公平的。”

;

;她转而探究原因，试图用纪录片展现部分答案。片子剪了一个又一个版本，像一个个欲言又止的回答，现在的版本，涉及家庭、命运、理想等众多议题。

;

;“可能没有人能够说得清，（原因）是综合性的。他个人是有一定原因的，比如说他太脆弱了，太容易放弃，这跟他从小成长的环境、家庭关系有关，也跟社会环境有关，比如说他没遇到那种扶持自己去做这方面尝试的机会，没有衔接得很好的、培养自己的氛围。”秦潇越推翻了起初想拍一个郁郁不得志的理想青年的设想，“这些素材也够做一个短片出来。但我如果做那样一个片子的话，好像就忽略掉了他生命当中更重要的对他的影响。”

;

; Mon, 16 Oct 2023 18:25:03 +0800 在反物质的世界里，牛顿的苹果还会落地吗？http://www.infzm.com/contents/258698
;;2023-10-16 17:00:00;
;

;;

;

;反氢原子（蓝色小球）在竖井里下落，同物质相遇发生了湮灭。 ;（美国国家科学基金会/图）;

;

;我们生活在一个“物质世界”中，从宇宙到人体再到细胞，都是物质。但物理学家的研究表明，与物质相对应，宇宙中还存在反物质，他们对此进行了近百年的探索。2023年9月27日，欧洲核子研究中心（CERN）的ALPHA合作组在《自然》（;Nature;）上发表了一篇论文，公布了他们对反物质的最新研究结果。他们在实验中发现，反氢原子在引力作用下会自由下落，这和物质在引力作用下的运动方式相同。

;

;ALPHA合作组发言人、丹麦奥胡斯大学物理学教授同时也是这篇论文的通讯作者之一的杰弗里·汉斯特（Jeffrey Hangst）表示：“这是首次直接在实验中观测到引力对于反物质运动的作用，在反物质研究的历史上是一个里程碑。”

;

;;反物质的谜团;

;

;1928年，英国物理学家保罗·狄拉克（Paul Dirac）提出了狄拉克方程，预言了反物质的存在。在他的理论中，存在一种粒子，除电性和电子相反外，其他所有性质都和电子相同，这种粒子后来被命名为正电子。1932年，美国物理学家卡尔·安德森（Carl Anderson）在实验中发现了狄拉克预言的正电子，他也因此获得了1936年诺贝尔物理学奖。

;

;反物质被发现后，物理学家开始研究反物质的性质，并且思考反物质与引力的关系。1915年，爱因斯坦提出了广义相对论，建立了迄今为止最成功的引力理论。从1919年的日食观测到2015年发现引力波，广义相对论的预言在一个世纪里不断得到证实，也经受住一系列实验的考验。

;

;在爱因斯坦提出广义相对论的时候，包括他在内的物理学家还不知道反物质的存在。但在广义相对论中，相同质量的物体受到的引力相同，而与它们的内在结构或性质无关。因此，物质和反物质受到的引力作用应该是相同的。过去的一些实验表明，引力对物质和反物质的作用效果相同，但这些实验都只能间接地证明这一点。

;

;数十年来，物理学家都希望通过直接实验来研究这个问题，ALPHA合作组此次完成的就是这样一次直接实验。在爱因斯坦之前，牛顿建立了成功的引力理论，他被落下的苹果砸中从而想出万有引力定律的故事可谓是家喻户晓。虽然这只是一个故事，但是物理学家在这个实验中希望研究的问题可以理解为：在一个由反物质组成的世界里，苹果还会掉下并且砸到牛顿吗？

;

;物理学家探究反物质在引力作用下的运动，还希望借此回答一个事关宇宙演化的关键问题。根据大爆炸理论，宇宙大爆炸发生时应该产生同等数量的物质和反物质，但是这些物质和反物质却没有发生湮灭而全部转化成能量，而且我们今天生活在一个几乎完全由物质组成的宇宙中。这被称为“正反物质不对称之谜”，是当今物理学中最大的谜团之一。

;

;大部分物理学家根据广义相对论，相信反物质和物质在引力的作用下应该有相同的行为；但也有物理学家支持反重力理论，他们认为反物质在引力作用下不是向下掉落，而是反方向向上飞起。这样一来，在宇宙形成之初，物质和反物质在引力作用下就会向着相反的方向运动，经过138亿年的演化，我们今日所处的宇宙中就不会探测到反物质的存在，从而可以破解正反物质不对称之谜。因此，如果物理学家在实验中直接观察到反物质在引力作用下的运动和物质存在差异，就将获得解决这一难题的重要线索，甚至在物理学中引发一场颠覆性的革命。

;

;;

;

;工作人员正在安装ALPHA-g仪器。;（欧洲核子研究中心/图）;

;

;;制造反物质;

;

;和牛顿最负盛名的“故事”一样，引力理论的先驱伽利略在比萨斜塔完成两个铁球同时落地的实验，从而推翻亚里士多德的落体定律，同样是一个后人杜撰的故事。不过，如果想研究反物质在引力作用下的运动，物理学家会很自然地想到可以用落体实验来考察反物质是否和物质遵循一样的引力定律。只不过，这个思路虽然理论上可行，在实验中却困难重重。

;

;在任何两个有质量的物体之间都存在引力。在已知的自然界的4种基本作用力中，引力是作用距离最长的力，因此在宇宙演化和天体相互作用中扮演着最重要的角色。但是，引力又是4种力中最弱的力，对质量极小的粒子而言，引力的作用效果可谓微乎其微。举例来说，对一个反质子而言，1V/m的电场施加的力的大小是地球施加的引力大小的40万亿倍。因此，如果使用带电的反物质粒子作为实验对象的话，几乎不可能完成检验引力作用效果的实验，研究人员只能选择电中性的反物质粒子。

;

;反氢原子是氢原子对应的反物质，由一个正电子环绕一个反质子组成。它既是最简单的反物质原子，又是电中性且稳定的反物质粒子，这些性质使得反氢原子成为研究反物质的引力行为的最佳选择。

;

;目前，物理学家都是在实验室中获得反物质粒子。例如，在高能粒子碰撞中产生的粒子都是成对出现的，一个物质粒子对应一个反物质粒子。但是，把反物质粒子结合到一起形成反原子却非常困难，因为反物质粒子的寿命通常都非常短暂。当一个反物质粒子与对应的物质粒子相遇的时候，它们会发生湮灭，转化成能量。在一个由物质组成的世界里，反物质粒子很难相遇再结合成反原子。

;

;因此，虽然反氢原子是最简单的反物质原子，但目前世界上也只有欧洲核子研究中心能够制造反氢原子，物理学家在那里使用反氢激光物理仪器（Antihydrogen Laser Physics Apparatus，ALPHA）对反物质进行研究。ALPHA合作组的研究人员通过高速质子碰撞获得反质子。此后，一台名为ELENA的减速器可以将反质子的速度降到足够慢，以便物理学家进行下一步操作。在欧洲核子研究中心，有几个研究反物质的实验都依靠ELENA提供便于操控的反质子，其中就包括这次实验。与此同时，他们从放射源中收集正电子。接下来，他们把二者结合在一起，就创造出反氢原子。

;

;;下落的反物质;

;

;在获得了反氢原子后，研究人员把它们推到一个3米高的竖井中，这个装置被称作ALPHA-g，其中“g”表示重力加速度。竖井的周围围绕着超导电磁线圈，从而避免反物质与物质接触进而发生湮灭。研究人员让竖井中较热的反氢原子逃逸出去，这样竖井中的反氢原子气体就会变得更冷，只比绝对零度高0.5℃。剩下的反氢原子以很慢的速度运动。

;

;接下来，研究人员逐渐减弱竖井顶部和底部的磁场，这就相当于打开了一个罐子的盖子和底部。当反氢原子逃逸出来并发生湮灭的时候，研究人员使用两台传感器来测量湮灭发生的位置。在实验中，他们一次在竖井里困住大约100个反氢原子，然后在20多秒的时间里，通过逐渐减小竖井顶部和底部磁铁中的电流的方式把反氢原子释放出来。

;

;在我们的日常生活中，如果打开一个气体容器的话，里面的气体会向各个方向逃逸。但是反氢原子此时的运动速度很慢，如果反物质和物质受到相同形式的引力作用，那么地球引力此刻就会产生明显的效应：大部分的反氢原子应该从底部逸出，少部分会从顶部逸出。计算机模拟显示，对于物质来说，这个操作将导致有大约20%的原子从竖井的顶部逸出，而大约80%的原子从竖井的底部逸出。

;

;研究人员在这项研究中进行了7次实验，在每次实验中，偏置磁场的大小不一样，这个磁场既可以加强也可以抵消引力。通过将7次实验的结果进行平均，ALPHA合作组发现反氢原子从顶部和底部逸出竖井的比例与模拟的结果一致。经过计算，他们给出的反氢原子受到的重力加速度的值为0.75 ± 0.29 g，g是当地的重力加速度。因此，他们得出结论：在目前的测量精度范围内，反氢原子的加速同由地球引力引起的物质的加速是一致的。

;

;2010年，汉斯特领导的团队在历史上首次成功囚禁了反氢原子。2016年，他们又成功测量了反原子如何吸收光线。但是引力实验的复杂程度前所未有，正如他所言：“这是到目前为止我们完成的最困难的事情。”

;

;虽然这次实验还存在一定的误差，但是研究人员认为，他们至少能够决定性地排除一种可能，即引力对反物质的作用是排斥的，也就是说，反重力理论不可能成立。由此我们能够确认：在反物质的世界里，苹果也是向下掉落，也许会砸到那个世界里的“牛顿”。

;

;ALPHA合作组计划在2024年进行更加精确的测量，精度将达到此次实验的100倍。汉斯特表示：“我们用了30年的时间学会如何制造反原子、如果使它们持续存在以及如何很好地控制它们，这样我们才能使它们在引力的作用下掉落。下一步是尽可能精确地测量这种加速。我们希望去验证无论是物质还是反物质都以相同的方式下落。”

;

;ALPHA合作组此次公布的结果是一个意料之中的发现，但正如汉斯特所说，这仍然是一项具有里程碑意义的成果。物理学是一门实验科学，以实验验证理论猜想正是其中最核心的部分。物理学家通过这项实验不仅验证了此前的猜想，也奠定了研究中性反物质的重要基础。在以此为起点开始的反物质研究中，也许会诞生一些意料之外的发现，从而改写我们对物质与反物质的形成和演化的理解，真正破解物理学中最大的谜团之一。

;

;;技术要闻;

;

;;;【01】迄今最全面的人类脑细胞图谱;;

;

;10月13日，《科学》（Science）发布“脑细胞普查”（Brain Cell Census）专题，21篇研究论文同时在《科学》及其子刊《科学-进展》（Science Advances）和《科学-转化医学》（Science Translational Medicine）上线（分别发表了12篇、8篇、1篇），分享了迄今为止最全面的人类和非人灵长类动物大脑细胞图谱。

;

;这些成果来自美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）在2017年首次启动利用高新技术进行大脑研究的计划——“脑计划-细胞普查网络”项目，简称BICCN（BRAIN Initiative Cell Census Network）。科研小组利用先进的分子生物学技术开展了一系列研究，尤其是从单细胞层面以前所未有的颗粒度解析了人脑的组织结构，包括成年人脑和胚胎期正在发育的人脑，识别和描绘出了人脑细胞类型的惊人多样性。

;

;;• ;;点评：2021年10月，BICCN项目曾在《自然》一次发表16篇论文，在分子水平上全面绘制哺乳动物初级运动皮层细胞类型的特征，两年后的这一系列研究成果不仅为细胞类型多样性在人类大脑区域和物种特异性差异中的作用提供了新的视角，还为研究不同科学问题模型的开发和选择提供信息，将有助于解决有关人类大脑及其遗传组织的基本科学问题。（罗仙仙）;

;

;;;【02】“;;九章三号;;”;;刷新光量子信息技术世界纪录;;

;

;10月11日，中国科学技术大学潘建伟、陆朝阳等组成的研究团队与中国科学院上海微系统与信息技术研究所、国家并行计算机工程技术研究中心合作，在国际知名学术期刊《物理评论快报》（Physical Review Letters）发表论文，宣布成功构建255个光子的量子计算原型机“九章三号”，再度刷新了光量子信息的技术水平和量子计算优越性的世界纪录。

;

;;

;

;图说：光量子计算的国际竞争态势;。;图片来源：中国科学技术大学网站

;

;研究团队设计了时空解复用的光子探测新方法，构建了高保真度的准光子数可分辨探测器，提升了光子操纵水平和量子计算复杂度，“九章三号”处理高斯玻色取样的速度比上一代“九章二号”提升一百万倍，“九章三号”1微秒可算出的最复杂样本，当前全球最快的超级计算机“前沿”（Frontier）约需200亿年。;;

;

;;• ;;点评：量子计算是后摩尔时代的一种新的计算范式，也是各国科研团队竞相追逐的科技前沿，“九章三号”进一步巩固了中国在光量子计算领域的领先地位。（李一跞）;

;

;;;【03】接受猪肾移植的灵长类动物可存活;;2;;年;;

;

;10月11日，《自然》（Nature）在线发表美国生物科技公司eGenesis、哈佛医学院合作研究论文Design and testing of a humanized porcine donor for xenotransplantation，研究团队设计了可用于临床的基因修饰猪肾脏供体，并在非人灵长动物体内成功实现异种移植和长期存活。

;

;为克服异种器官的免疫排斥障碍并提高移植安全性，研究人员对尤卡坦（Yucatan）迷你猪供体进行了69处基因组编辑，包括敲除了被认为会引起免疫排斥的三个聚糖抗原（3KO），过表达7种人类转基因（7TG）以减少灵长类免疫系统的排斥反应，同时让猪逆转录病毒基因的所有拷贝失活（RI）。实验结果发现，携带人类转基因的供体肾脏移植到食蟹猴中可显著延长存活时间，在同时接受临床相关免疫移植方案、属于接受含有敲除和人类转基因猪肾移植的一只食蟹猴，存活时间超过2年（758天）。目前实验仍在进行中。

;

;;• ;;点评：上述研究成果，证明了基因修饰的猪肾脏可以在异种移植后长期存活，显示了猪器官移植到人体的前景。2022年1月、2023年9月，基于美国FDA“同情使用”计划，马里兰大学医学院曾完成了两例猪心脏的人类活体移植。尽管异种移植的大规模临床应用还远，但科学探索一直在继续。（罗仙仙）;

;

;;;【04】植物通过有性生殖实现远缘杂交的新机制;;

;

;10月7日，北京大学生命科学学院、北大-清华生命科学联合中心、新基石科学实验室瞿礼嘉/钟声团队在Cell发表论文Antagonistic RALF peptides control an intergeneric hybridization barrier on Brassicaceae stigmas，在分子水平上解析了拟南芥柱头识别并接受自己花粉以及近缘花粉而不接受远缘花粉的机制，阐明了种间/属间生殖障碍形成的机理。应用这一成果，他们成功地在两种于两千七百万年前开始分化的、现在分属两个不同属的植物种之间实现了远缘杂交并获得了杂交胚。

;

;;• ;;点评：新物种对维持地球上的生物多样性具有重要意义。不同物种之间的杂交是形成新物种的一种重要机制，如小麦、棉花和油菜等多种重要的经济作物，都源自自然界植物间的杂交。该发现解释了不同种植物间杂交的生殖障碍机制，揭示了植物柱头处关键生殖杂交屏障的分子基础，从而找到了简单、有效打破关键生殖障碍的方法。这对于实现植物远缘杂交，为农业、园艺等领域创制全新种质资源具有重要的理论意义和广阔的应用前景。（罗仙仙）;

;

;;;【05】一种可促进伤口愈合的纳米纤维水凝胶;;

;

;10月6日，华南理工大学教授王小英团队、暨南大学附属第一医院副教授张还添及教授查振刚团队，在《生物活性材料》（Bioactive Materials）发表论文Collagen fibril-like injectable hydrogels from self-assembled nanoparticles for promoting wound healing，研究团队通过利用自组装和化学交联结合的策略，开发出一种具有低硬度、高抗压强度、抗溶胀、可载药和生物降解的胶原纤维状可注射水凝胶。

;

;该研究利用甲基丙烯酰化羟丙基壳聚糖（HM）和锂皂石（LAP）间的自组装形成纳米粒子，然后通过粒子间光交联制备了一种可注射、软而韧且抗溶胀的纳米纤维水凝胶用于促进伤口愈合。该水凝胶具有良好的生物相容性以及生物降解能力，通过加快细胞迁移和促进新生血管形成及成熟，进而加快伤口愈合。;;;;;;

;

;;• ;;点评：这种新型仿生水凝胶在伤口敷料等各种软组织工程应用中极具潜力，并为仿生纳米纤维软水凝胶的开发及围手术期切口、伤口的快速愈合提供了通用策略，具有临床转化价值。（李一跞）;

;

;;;【06】发现海洋光合作用关键色素合成酶;;

;

;10月6日，西湖大学生命科学学院李小波团队在《科学》（Science）发表论文A chlorophyll c synthase widely co-opted by phytoplankton，首次揭示了叶绿素c合成酶编码基因及该酶作用机制。研究团队从三角褐指藻基因组中根据各基因在不同生长条件下的表达水平选取了数十个候选基因，依次进行敲除与表型检测，发现了叶绿素c合成酶（Chl c synthase，简称CHLC）；结合Tara Oceans全球海洋生物调查数据，研究团队发现CHLC同源基因广泛分布于全球海洋；系统演化分析结果表明，褐藻可能采用未知的、独立演化出的酶来合成叶绿素c。这一结果也表明现在的光合作用机制演化学说还有待修正。

;

;;• ;;点评：光合作用是地球上所有生命的基础，是一个复杂的过程，人类目前还不能完全解密。上述研究解决了长期以来困扰海洋光合作用领域的一个问题，并为海洋藻类捕光机制的合成生物学应用打开了一扇门。（罗仙仙）;

;

;;企业要闻;

;

;;;【07】丰田汽车与出光兴产合作全固态电池;;

;

;10月12日，丰田汽车与出光兴产(Idemitsu Kosan)宣布，双方将合作开发固体电解质的大规模生产技术、提高生产率、构建供应链，目标为2027-2028年商业化，随后量产。出光兴产自2001年以来投入全固态电池的基本技术研发，而丰田则从2006年开始。此次双方合作的重点是硫化物固态电解质，这种材料被认为是实现高容量和高输出的动力电池理想材料。

;

;;• ;;点评：全固态电池被看作下一代电池，能量密度更高、充电速度更快。近年丰田汽车被外界批评为在汽车电动化领域积极性不够，原来它已经在布局下一代技术。（李一跞）;

;

;;;【08】马士基将在集装箱船添加;;Starlink;;

;

;10月12日，丹麦物流巨头马士基(Maersk)宣布，将在其自有的330多艘集装箱船上添加SpaceX的星链(Starlink)卫星网络，提供超过每秒200兆比特的高速上网服务，安装预计将于2024年一季度完成。Starlink是埃隆·马斯克(Elon Musk)的SpaceX一直在建设的全球通信网络，已发射超过5000颗卫星。

;

;高速互联网能为船员带来无缝流媒体和高清视频通话，还将通过将关键业务应用程序迁移到云端以及加强船舶的远程支持和检查，促进成本节约措施。

;

;;• ;;点评：卫星网络正在打破地面基站的限制，帮助人们更好地接入高速互联网，与马士基的这一合作，是在海洋尤其是在公海领域的一个突破，从海洋到高空、从专用设备到随身携带的智能手机，卫星网络的商业价值和应用场景正在持续拓展中。（李一跞）;

;

;;;【09】AMD;;收购;;AI;;初创公司;;Nod.ai;;

;

;10月10日，AMD宣布收购AI软件初创公司Nod.ai，以扩展其开源人工智能软件功能，但并未披露收购价格。

;

;Nod.ai成立于2013年，是一家人工智能和机器学习系统公司，为人工智能系统提供关键的开源技术。Nod.ai已开发SHARK;、;Torch-MLIR和OpenXLA/IREE等代码生成技术，目前已经广泛部署在云中、边缘和端点设备中，可以帮助企业快速部署针对AMD芯片进行优化的人工智能模型。

;

;点评：软件和软件开发者生态，也是芯片制造商的必争之地。在收购Nod.ai之前，AMD在2023年8月还收购了法国的AI初创公司Mipsology，紧紧抓住人工智能技术和产品的快速增长机会，以更好地追赶竞争对手英伟达。（唐家乐）

;

;;;【10】舍弗勒收购纬湃科技;;

;

;10月9日，舍弗勒集团宣布以36.4亿欧元（91欧元/股）的现金报价收购纬湃科技（Vitesco），以增强舍弗勒集团在电动汽车行业的竞争地位。纬湃科技拥有电动汽车的核心组件和先进的系统解决方案，双方有高度互补的技术组合。

;

;纬湃科技于2018年从大陆集团的动力总成事业部拆分而来，2021年在法兰克福证券交易所上市，舍弗勒家族是其最大单一股东。该家族同时还持有舍弗勒集团和大陆集团的控股权。

;

;目前该交易已递交德国联邦金融监管机构审批，预计将于2024年第四季度完成。届时，新舍弗勒集团将成为一家拥有超过12万名员工，在全球拥有44个研发中心和100多个生产基地，营收约为250亿欧元的零部件巨头。;;;;;;

;

;;• ;;点评：汽车业即将诞生一个新的汽车零部件巨头，汽车行业的电动化变革，也使得汽车零部件产业链的并购重组精彩纷呈。（李一跞）;

;

;;;【11】亚马逊发射首批两颗太空互联网测试卫星;;

;

;10月6日，亚马逊太空互联网Kuiper项目（柯伊伯项目）的两颗原型卫星KuiperSat-1和KuiperSat-2，搭载联合发射联盟（ULA）的Atlas V火箭从佛罗里达州卡纳维拉尔角太空基地发射升空，部署在距离地球311英里(约合500公里)的高度。

;

;这是柯伊伯项目发射的首批卫星。亚马逊于2018年开启柯伊伯项目，2020年7月获美国联邦通信委员会(FCC)部署和运营卫星的许可证。;;;;;;;;;;

;

;;• ;;点评：2022年4月，亚马逊宣布与阿里安航天（Arianespace）、蓝色起源（Blue Origin）和联合发射联盟（ULA）三家公司签署太空发射协议，在后续5年里为柯伊伯项目进行83次发射，将3236颗卫星部署在近地轨道上。此次发射，正式开启了亚马逊的太空通信基建，卫星通信也将展开新一轮的竞争。（唐家乐）;

;

;;;【12】婴幼儿常见癌症新疗法获;;FDA;;专家委员会支持;;

;

;10月4日，美国FDA肿瘤学药物咨询委员会以14：6的投票结果，支持美国制药公司US WorldMeds的在研疗法eflornithine（DFMO），在降低高危神经母细胞瘤儿科患者复发风险方面的疗效。US WorldMeds在研发eflornithine时没有使用随机临床试验（RCT），有望创造不依靠RCT支持新药获批的先例。

;

;神经母细胞瘤是婴幼儿中最常见的癌症之一，是一种极具侵袭性的肿瘤，常规治疗方法的5年生存率仅为10;％;—20%。eflornithine是鸟氨酸脱羧酶（ODC)的口服不可逆抑制剂;，;在一项2期临床试验中，接受eflornithine治疗的患者与根据历史数据筛选的外部对照组相比，无事件生存率和总生存率均获得显著提高。

;

;;• ;;点评：RCT是新药临床开发的常见选择，但在罕见疾病或严重、致命疾病患者中，随机对照临床试验可能面临挑战和伦理问题。美国FDA肿瘤学药物咨询委员会的支持，是对eflornithine治疗神经母细胞瘤的有效性和安全性的认可，也为该药物的临床应用提供更多支持，让患者可以有更多治疗选择和生存希望。（罗仙仙）;

; Mon, 16 Oct 2023 16:55:04 +0800 “伞买票了吗”：明明错了，为什么坚决不认错？http://www.infzm.com/contents/258515
;;2023-10-16 16:00:00;
;

;知错能改，善莫大焉。从小我们就被教导，勇于面对错误、敢于改正错误是一种美德。然而在现实生活中，却有人视美德如敝帚，不仅有错不改，还明知故犯，错上加错。

;

;午后下雨，我去乘公交车，发现想坐的座位被一把湿漉漉的伞占了，只得另找座位。之后上来的乘客也一样，想坐那个座位，看到有伞不得不另找座位。其中一位老者行动不便，好不容易才蹒跚到最后一排落座。

;

;老者艰难行走的样子让人心生恻隐，一位老大爷看不下了，问伞主为什么不把伞拿起来。伞主解释她上车时没有其他乘客，当时在接电话，就顺手把伞放在座位上。老大爷以伞是湿的，不能放在座位上是人之常识继续追问，伞主以座位反正被打湿了不能坐一再辩解。两人反复理论，在周围乘客站队老大爷后，伞主突然变脸，蛮横地表示她的伞想放哪就放哪，不关老大爷的事，还讥讽老大爷买不起伞。幸好周围乘客打圆场，公交车刚好开到老大爷下车的站台，不然双方可能爆发更大的争执。

;

;老大爷下车后，坐在最后一排的老者批评他多事，有些话讲得很难听。这实在让乘客们意外，老大爷明明是看到同为老年人的他行动不便，才开口打抱不平的，没想到他居然不领情，还倒刺一枪。伞主见有人帮腔，又讲起她放伞的理由，强调自己在外面一直是个讲规矩的人。直到有乘客问她伞买票了吗，她才闭嘴，但是仍然不把伞拿起来。

;

;很小的一件事，相信换作多数人，在被提醒不该把伞放在座位上时，会立刻把伞拿起来。一个简单的动作，就可以避免一场火药味十足的争执，伞主为什么不肯呢？上车时没有其他乘客，伞放在座位上不碍事，觉得放伞有理，这是她的第一个解释。这也是有些人在面对自身错误时的第一反应，不是立即纠错，而是从自己的角度、立场和维护自身利益出发，为错误寻找合理化理由。理由越充分，越能自圆其说，越觉得应该被理解，甚至自认为没有错，自然谈不上纠错。

;

;认为座位已经被打湿不能坐，是伞主的第二个解释。既成事实无法改变，表面上看有道理，其实隐含着高高在上的傲慢。这种傲慢，与环境塑造有关。从小到大，孩子向父母认错、学生向老师认错、员工向领导认错、下级向上级认错常见，反之不常见。强者有理、上位者有理的潜意识根深蒂固。从伞主后来的言语，可以看出她优越感十足的傲慢，那就是我的伞放在座位上很正常，你们谁都没有权利说我。

;

;认错改错需要勇气，发现错误指出错误更需要勇气。魏征直言进谏的历史典故流传至今，我们也知道“人生得一诤友足矣”。然而在现实生活中，人们喜欢鲜花与掌声，远胜于良药与批评声。纠错者往往是孤独的，因为他们的挺身而出，不仅让犯错者错无可藏心生怨恨，还反衬出旁观者、受益者的懦弱卑怯，令其心生羞愧。老者的批评，便是例证。如果老大爷听见了他的话，下一次还会挺身而出纠错吗？纠错者少了，犯错者就会多起来，以至于身在错中不知错，是非不分。

;

;每个人都有缺点，没有人是完美的。出错不要紧，错误本身就是成长的一部分。无论孩子还是家长，学生还是老师，员工还是领导，下级还是上级，出现了错误，勇敢直面错误，真诚改正就好。给纠错者以坚定的支持，给改错者以真诚的鼓励，错误才能生发出滋养美德的力量。

;

;（作者为西南地区事业单位人员）

;

; Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:55:03 +0800 一个理性的人爱上航海，这是我做的最疯狂的事——对话徐京坤http://www.infzm.com/contents/258538
;;2023-10-16 15:00:00;
;

;;

;

;"In 2021, I will come to Brittany again to start my IMOCA plan. Offshore sailing is still in its infancy in China. Due to budget constraints, I once again live on my boat, but this time my boat is 60 feet";(Interview Provided by the author/picture);

;

;When there are friends around him, Xu Jingkun is often a listener. "I seem to have very few friends of the same age. All the friends I have are older brothers." He likes to listen to big brothers. The buddies chatted about everything, "You can learn a lot."

;

;In the past two years, the eldest buddies often got together because of his return to China, and the topics mostly revolved around him and his circumnavigation and transatlantic sailing race. And his IMOCA60 super racing boat.

;

;Even if everyone is talking about himself, Xu Jingkun is still used to silence. When he is not talking, his face, which has been tanned by the sun all year round, looks particularly calm. "Actually, I often do this at sea. I don't speak, but I enjoy it in my heart. The lack of expression does not mean that I am unhappy, but I have such a habit of being 'lazy in talking'."

;

;He said that he is a "Stupid", this is absolutely not the case. He is sensitive, humble and well-measured. When we politely asked the eldest brother to "exit" and started a two-and-a-half-hour in-depth conversation in a big brother's quiet and undisturbed office, he opened himself up to us with accurate and moving expressions.

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun's old childhood photos, the accident has not happened yet, he is a lively and healthy mountain child;(provided by the interviewee/picture)< /span>;

;

;Sailing makes me feel comfortable, which is the biggest gain

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;When did you feel particularly comfortable and at ease? Many disabled people use sleeves to cover their missing parts, or wear prosthetics when going out, but you just naturally expose your left arm and even use it as a hand or an arm. ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;Yes, I am very calm and I am very free. When I first started training at Shandong Sports School, it was not possible. Even though you were training as a disabled athlete, when others looked at you, you would feel uncomfortable and nervous yourself. Later, I joined the national sailing team and slowly began to change. But what really liberated me was that after the national team was disbanded, I started sailing on my own. ;

;

;Sailing really changed me completely. When many people talk about me, they always say that I am successful now and have changed my destiny. In fact, the biggest gain for me is this kind of freedom. Sailing makes me live very freely. I can choose what I want and my current situation, which is very good.

;

;From the time I decided to sail, from the time I first sailed around the China Sea, my life began to change. Whether it's loneliness at sea, wind and waves, or even some fears sometimes, after you experience it too much, you will gain that kind of freedom and become very comfortable, not caring about external things or what others think. In this way It's very comfortable to be alive.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;What do you think of the "one-armed captain" given to you by others? Label? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;I gave it to myself, haha. When Ajiu (;Xu Jingkun’s wife and partner Xiao Shuyao;) wrote my biography "The Humble Dreamer", I told She, you need to write "one-armed captain" in the title. The media teachers we have contacted over the years are also very professional. Many times they will ask very politely, "Shouldn't we write like this, or what kind of title is more appropriate?" I will tell them to just write " One-armed Captain". I don’t think there’s anything that shouldn’t be said. On the contrary, one-armedness is a very unique thing about me. ;

;

;You dare to face it only if you dare to speak, right? I don’t care about this at all now. In fact, there is no need to talk about whether I care or not. If you are still thinking about whether you care or not, it means you still care. (Laughs) Let’s put it this way, I think my left arm is great. When I have children in the future, I will be the most unique father in their eyes, which is cool.

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun used this J24 to start a circumnavigation of the China Sea from the northernmost point to the southernmost point of China. It was the first ship in his life and also his first time. Solo voyage;(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;It is not easy for you to fully reconcile with the accidental injury caused by the explosion when you were 12 years old. ;

;

;;徐京坤：;;是的，这个事已经完全翻篇了，已经完全结束了，在我的生命里伤害和阴影已经完全被驱除掉了。 This is what sailing has brought me, including my growth and experiences along the way. I am very lucky! An accidental injury is like a devil appearing in life. It wants to hurt me, but before it can really hurt me, I have already defeated it. ;

;

;Looking back now, I can feel that if I had not stepped out in time to defeat it, I would most likely have been defeated by it. I can also feel that many friends with physical disabilities have been deeply hurt physically and mentally due to their disability, and I always want to give them some encouragement.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Many people outside the sailing circle know you from "Ten In that episode of "Three Invitations", when you were talking to teacher Xu Zhiyuan, you said that you "have never felt at ease in the first half of your life." What time are you in now? Is it the previous life or the next life? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;It’s still the first half of my life, and I’m still not at ease. I actually don’t have particularly big ambitions, I just don’t like falling to the bottom. The so-called bottom does not mean material life. I am very adaptable to life. Now I still often only eat two meals a day. It’s not that I don’t have money, but that I don’t have time. I have a lot of work to do on the ship, and it’s very troublesome if the work at hand is interrupted. I would rather finish it without eating. If you don't like the bottom, you don't like the feeling of having no goals and not being able to control your own life. ;

;

;After setting the goal of participating in the 2024 Vendée Globe, life has become a battle. The Solo Transatlantic at Rum Road in 2022 and the Double Transatlantic at Café Road in 2023 are all aimed at qualifying for the Vendée Globe. We don’t have the financial resources to take our time, so we can only treat one season as 3 seasons and one person as For 10 people, our team only has 5 people, and the German team has 50 people.

;

;Because this is my own goal and I like this goal, I don’t feel how hard life is or how big my sacrifice is. Most people would have a hard time adapting to my life and would suffer to death, but I think this is the life I dream of. In a very beautiful pier, on a very good racing boat, doing what I most want to do, doing my own professional things, without being dominated, commanded or controlled by anyone, I think this is very good, right Bar?

;

;;

;

;On the way around the China Sea, Xu Jingkun once fell into the water and drifted to Dongyin Island in Taiwan, China. When Xu Jingkun left, local children brought him rare candy milk on the island to see him off< span style="color: #aaa;">;(provided by the interviewee/picture);

;

;I am a "stupid person"

;

;;Southern People Weekly ：;;What attracts you most about sailing? Is it the thrill of adventure? The freedom of going deep into the ocean away from the crowd, or the desire to return to the mainland and embrace family and friends after fighting the waves? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun:;;Actually, I am also trying to understand myself on a deeper level. What do I want? ;

;

;Navigation is even contrary to my nature. I am very cautious and cautious. I like a room with doors and windows tightly closed so that no thief can sneak in. But sailing is always exposed to wind. No matter how well-prepared you are on the shore, situations will always arise at sea, and you have to hold your "shield" to resist them on all sides. It's very embarrassing. I actually don't like that kind of accident.

;

;I'm not that romantic either. There is a kind of person who really likes the solitude of sailing on the sea, such as the legendary French navigator Bernard. He was disgusted with cities and crowds. He loved freedom and sailing crazily and enjoyed solitude. I'm not that kind of person, I'm not that crazy. I am a "fake lunatic", and I am not the artistic type. When I'm at sea, I always miss my family and friends on the shore. I want to drink beer and have barbecue with them when we dock.

;

;Whether I was a professional athlete on the national sailing team or am now engaged in extreme sailing competitions, I do not have a competitive mentality that insists on winning championships, advocating gold medals and winner takes all. Some people who compete in extreme sailing competitions participate in the competition just to win. Their competitive strategies are very aggressive. If they cannot win, they may choose to quit the competition. Neither am I.

;

;;

;

;On September 19, 2015, Duarnenez, the one-man transatlantic extreme sailing race, set sail. Dream was the first to break out of the starting line. Friends dressed in local clothes came to see Xu Jingkun off;(provided by the interviewee/picture);

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You are not crazy, you are very rational. Sailing seems like the craziest thing you, a rational person, could do. ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;Yes, I am very rational. But he seems to be doing something very irrational and crazy. He sailed around the China Sea and around the world, crossed the Atlantic Ocean in a 6.5-meter boat, and now bought a racing boat to participate in the world's most difficult extreme circumnavigation race. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;It can only mean that you really like this thing . As a rational person, you can devote so much to sailing. To you, this is really crazy to the extreme. ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;Yes, that’s true. The life we ​​live now is a complete state of madness. After crossing the Atlantic in a single-person boat in 2015, it was actually considered top-notch in China. At that time, I was working as the vice president of a yacht club in Shenzhen, and my income and treatment were very good. Let’s put aside the good life, from 2017 to 2020, I completed a three-year circumnavigation with Ah Jiu. After that, we had a pretty good time in Hainan, and I had the goal of participating in the Vendée Globe. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Qingdao has many sailing talents, and they have already gone before you There are several legends, why can you go further and further, especially starting your own journey to the world's top professional rowing captain in 2022? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;I am a "stupid person"! On the one hand, I am very rational, and on the other hand, I don’t think too much about anything. When I think something is good and worth doing, I won’t think about doing this or not doing that, or not doing it. How about doing this and that...;

;

;After I bought the IMOCA60 racing boat, I started to think about it, because I started to analyze rationally: I am a person from an ordinary peasant family, and every year Not making this money, but spending so much money...that's it.

;

;It costs 15,000 euros to lift the boat from the shore into the water, so there is no test drive. After paying the money, I got on the boat for the first time. It really felt unreal. It was completely different from all the boats I had sailed before. When that boat was flying on the sea, I saw why it was called the world's top racing boat. "I finally stood on this boat, and this boat belongs to us!" This feeling just rose in my heart, I felt a lot of pressure in the next second. There are so many cable accessories on this super racing boat, it is really difficult to learn in a short time, and an operating error will cause huge losses.

;

;I saw it was too complicated and thought it was impossible to solve it. After taking over, I never left the ship. I parked it on the dock and studied it every day. It took two months before I went to sea alone.

;

;I am not a very smart person, and I am very forgetful. I can’t figure out what I thought and calculated when I bought the boat. Forget it, we don’t want to think about it anymore, let’s talk about it tomorrow, tomorrow we will forget these things again, and you don’t want to think about it anymore.

;

;I like mechanical things, and I may have a little talent for boats. Our racing boat is very complicated. Many captains in Europe have engineering degrees, and they also have teams and coaches. I bought the boat by myself. I haven't graduated from junior high school, and I'm self-taught in English, but I'm not afraid, I can figure it out even if I spend some time.

;

;My experience with racing boats is pleasant most of the time, but it is too expensive and the maintenance bills are expensive. I feel distressed every time I have to pay a bill, but my rationality tells me to pay it quickly, and then forget about this unhappiness, haha.

;

;;

;

;In Madagascar, Xu Jingkun gave the ship’s batteries to local schools that had no electricity. All the children in the village followed him through the village ;(provided by the interviewee/picture);

;

;I want to be my own little hero< /h4>;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;We ordinary people will feel happy when we are close to the sea. Are you right? The feelings of the sea are a little more complicated than ours. It seems that there is no way to easily and simply say "I like the sea"? ;

;

;;徐京坤：;;我和大海之间是什么感情连接，我真得想一想。 For a long time, I actually had no time to think. This state made me particularly uncomfortable. Maritime navigation is my job, and I like this project myself, but this matter really makes me very tired now. I feel a little resistant when I think of going back to France, which is like a battlefield. ;

;

;I want to find a rational reason, I don’t want to easily say why I like it and why I don’t like it. I need to think about it, and I want to find a real answer that I feel comfortable with.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Global sailing and extreme transoceanic racing are completely different. In extreme racing, you face multiple pressures on funds and speed, as well as the formulation and execution of competition strategies. You cannot enjoy the voyage and the sea like you can when sailing around the world. Will the happy experience of sailing around the world for three years help you in this high-pressure period, so that you will always have feelings for the sea and sailing, so that it will not be all the pressure and consumption caused by the competition? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;Indeed. Sailing between the sky and the sea is a very wonderful enjoyment. I have been to so many places where the sea is connected, and everything I see and experience makes people feel wonderful. But I may actually prefer the specific sense of goal of extreme sailing competitions. If I keep floating on the sea, I will not be satisfied. ;

;

;I am a perfectionist and a bit heroic. I don’t mean to be a superhero who saves the earth alone. I want to be my own little hero. Withstanding the pressure and crossing the sea during extreme sailing, I feel like a little hero every time I come back after completing it.

;

;For me, from the arduous preparation before the start of the season, to the high pressure after the start, to the release when I finally arrive at the shore, it is the process that I enjoy the most.

;

;;

;

;Meet musicians from all over the world and catch up with the Hiwa Festival in Tahiti. The street band's performance makes sailors unable to help but dance;(provided by the interviewee/picture);

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;In addition to a sense of freedom and accomplishment, how has sailing shaped your personality? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun:;;Sailing has expanded my physical ability and will. My body is particularly good, which was developed under extreme requirements. I can feel the strong adaptability and recovery ability of my body, and the limits of my body are stimulated in the extreme environment. This is why I particularly like sailing. I can feel that I am a strong person among human beings. For me, this makes me stronger inside. ;

;

;Sailing is not about romantic yearning or blind bravery. You have to complete the extreme challenge, bring the racing boat back safely, and go ashore to give your waiting family a hug. A lot of specific and hard work needs to be done to get the boat in perfect condition before setting off. Any problems must be taken into consideration, and there are two or more sets of prepared contingency plans. Sailing has allowed me to develop a strong execution ability. "I do what I say". No matter how high the goal is, I will put in more effort. This is also engraved in my bones. Take everything seriously and never leave it at that.

;

;After experiencing the loneliness and wind and waves of sailing alone, I prefer daily life and love my environment and friends from the bottom of my heart. Calm, stable, storm-free daily life like now makes people cherish it, and makes people want to praise the beautiful weather and beautiful atmosphere.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You have had very lonely and difficult days, and you often have one when you are a teenager The fear and hopelessness of falling to the bottom of nowhere. When I set sail alone to circumnavigate the China Sea in 2012, I was filled with resentment as I feared that I would die. After so many years of sailing, have you made peace with yourself and your destiny? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun:;;At that time in 2012, I really felt like I was gambling with my fate, and I had a feeling in my heart that once a hero is gone, he will never return. That kind of tragic, even with some resentment, asking why my life has to be so difficult, if you don't believe me, I will fight to the death, I want to make this happen, yes, with this kind of energy. ;

;

;Now that these have been healed, it is very important to me to complete each goal one by one. You will slowly know that you can control your own destiny. When I was a child in the countryside, I lost half of my arm. I was surrounded by an environment where I really had no goals and my life was aimless. You don’t know where your goal is, and you have never achieved a goal. You will hate the cowardly and vulnerable self, and long to be full of fighting spirit and courage.

;

;Through sailing, I have one goal after another, which is also a process of self-healing and growth.

;

;Since I spent more than 7 months repairing a small boat that was about to be scrapped, named it "Dream", and achieved the first goal of circumnavigating the China Sea, I learned to believe in myself, Believe in the dream. In fact, if I failed that time, I might never get up again in this life, and I might be completely defeated. Not only was I defeated by external things, but my own line of defense was also gone. Looking back now, I really feel that it was understandable for others to say that I was unrealistic. I can say that I was too lucky. That beginning made me learn to believe, and this belief helped me step by step to get to where I am now.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Sail offshore, deep into the heart of the sea, on both sides of the mainland How would you feel about a scene like that at 1,500 nautical miles? Is the sea kind or malicious to sailors? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;I actually don’t have any special literary feelings. For my racing boat, I am not afraid when I am in the middle of the ocean. Its safety performance is very good. It is designed to fight against storms. As long as you don't make mistakes in operation, it is very safe. On the contrary, if it is close to the coast, fishing nets, passing ships and other things will pose a threat to the boat. ;

;

;The sea has no good intentions or malice. It has no intention of harming you. It exists objectively according to the laws of nature. People naturally calm down and become less cynical at sea. To be honest, I think I am more afraid of people. Sometimes I am too busy with sailing matters to not read the news, and my mind is very calm. When I pay attention to social news, I feel at a loss. The rules set by Western society are for the East, and the East must make some checks and balances against the West, right? Many things do not have an objective rule, they are mixed together and extremely complicated.

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun and British captain Mike Godin cooperated in sea trial;(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;The outside world has extremely high expectations of you, and you are very demanding of yourself. You also know that your rubber band has been stretched very tight. In the process of entering and completing the 2024 Vendée Globe, what changes will you make to make yourself more relaxed and calm, so as not to be broken? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun:;;Actually, I have started to make adjustments now, because I know that this thing is indeed too stressful and will really put people under pressure. Broken. ;

;

;The premise for adjustment is that the boat must be in perfect condition. If I take good care of the boat on the shore, then the boat can take good care of me in the deep sea. This is for sure. The coffee road race is about to start, and all the racing teams are very busy, but I can go back to China to rest and recuperate because I have done a lot of work day and night and the boat is already in the best condition.

;

;I also made some adjustments in my life. For a period of time, we lived on the boat to facilitate our work. Foreigners were also surprised to see us. The two Chinese people were working in the morning and evening. I just rented a house some time ago and my life is a little more normal. For a while, the pressure was so great that I was disgusted by the sight of the boat and lost the fun. I knew in my heart that this would definitely not work.

;

;Faced with the next devilish voyage like the Vendée Globe, if you don’t have sincere love, sincere faith, and lose your original intention, you won’t be able to persevere.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Vendée Global is known as the "Mount Everest of the Sea". The most difficult extreme sailing event on earth, your current goal is still to successfully obtain the ticket for the Vendée Globe. When you finally successfully complete the Vendée and return to your daily life without such specific and clear goals, you will be there At that time, having completed the most difficult competition goal, are you confident that you can devote yourself to ordinary life? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun: ;;It is true that I have this problem. Every time I complete a competition goal, after I stop, sometimes I don’t know how to deal with things in life. ;

;

;我的天赋是我能够去管理好一个单一的事情，我把这条船打造到极致，做得非常好，全力以赴，不偷懒不耍滑，这是我的一个性格。 But as soon as I return to life, I need to deal with some rules. Sometimes I feel that it is unfair and it makes me very uncomfortable. I don’t like to be suppressed, but sometimes you are unable to resist, including when it comes to personnel matters. I'm very insensitive to people.

;

;For example, if you look at the many good friends and elder brothers I have, in fact, every time I come back, I often neglect to bring them something or pay more attention to them and give back. I'm a retarded person in this regard. I often remember that I didn't bring anything with me until I arrived at someone's door. It's not like you don't understand this kind of worldliness. You understand it now that you're older, but it's always too late when you react. , life is always not so bright.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Coffee Road You partnered with the legendary British captain Mike Godin, The qualifying voyage of 1,200 nautical miles is 17 hours faster than last year’s Rum Road qualifying event. Mike has participated in the Vendée three times and won runner-up on the Café Road ten times. You are becoming more and more skilled in sailing. In addition to participating in and completing the race, do you have any higher expectations for the ranking? ;

;

;;Xu Jingkun:;;From my own ability and boat racing ability, I can indeed hit faster speeds. My boat is still Only 70% of the performance was released, and it was not pushed to the limit. But our strategy is to finish the race safely and get points. To be honest, I don't even have the money for a major repair, and I don't have the capital to run around. ;

;

;I have also clearly communicated this with Captain Mike Godin. He understands very well. He has also experienced this kind of difficult period with limited funds. The strategy is very clear, but it will still be a challenge to implement it without making mistakes. I remind myself every day not to be radical and not to be too quick! Must be slow, must be cautious! But many times at sea, decisions are made in a split second. At that moment, it is difficult to say that what you think is the right decision is truly wise. I hope that my partner and I can work well together and achieve a good balance in specific situations.

; Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:25:03 +0800 遭“恐袭预告”，法国缘何被恐怖组织盯上？http://www.infzm.com/contents/258676

;

;;

;

;On October 13, 2023 local time, a man holding a knife in Arras, France Killed a teacher and wounded two others at a high school. Counter-terrorism officials said they were leading an investigation into the knife attack. ;(Visual China/Photo);

;

;At a time when the international situation is extremely tense, terrorism strikes France again.

;

;On October 13, 2023 local time, after a knife attack occurred in the northern city of Arras, France stated that it was on terror alert and raised the threat level to the highest level. The attack left one teacher dead and three others seriously injured.

;

;Just one day later, France’s Louvre Museum, Palace of Versailles, Lyon Train Station and other landmark buildings issued “emergency evacuation orders” due to security threats. Some Louvre museum visitors posted on social media that loud sirens were heard during the evacuation.

;

;Just last month, Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula issued a "terrorist attack warning" to France and Sweden through an internal publication. French Interior Minister Gérald Darmanin said in an exclusive interview with L'Ouest-France that the authorities would respond as seriously as ever because "the risk of terrorism remains high."

;

;The fear of the "11.13 Paris terrorist attacks" many years ago came to mind. Why is France always targeted by terrorists?

;

;;The risk of terrorist attacks has revived;

;

;Eight years ago, after the "11.13 Paris terrorist attacks", people took to the streets and stood at the site of the attack. Place condolence candles and flowers.

;

;On the evening of November 17, 2015, at the memorial site near the Rue des Fountains de la King in Paris, photographer Benjamin Filarski spotted a sad policeman leaning on the shoulders of his colleagues among the mourning crowd. Crying.

;

;Benjamin seized the opportunity and pressed the shutter, freezing the heartbreaking scene. He posted the photo on social media, titled "Crying Police."

;

;Eight years later, this scene of police crying, which represented the painful memory of France, appeared in a new round of "terrorist attack notices".

;

;According to a report by French Commercial FMTV (BFMTV) on September 14, Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP) issued a "terrorist threat" to France and Sweden in its latest publication "Voice of Combat" .

;

;In a propaganda poster published by Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP), a masked man is holding a long gun and looking down from a high position. Under cold eyes, two French policemen hugged each other and cried.

;

;It is understood that the article of the promotional material was disseminated through a variety of Internet platforms. The article also suggested that after a series of scripture-burning incidents, Sweden "led the EU countries in combating Islam and Muslim countries."

;

;Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula is a radical Islamist organization mainly active in Yemen and Saudi Arabia. After the terrorist attack on Charlie Hebdo in Paris in January 2015, the organization "claimed responsibility."

;

;“犯罪前科”与赤裸裸的挑衅，引发了法国当局的担忧。

;

;“很长一段时间里，我们以为这种情况不会再次发生。然而阿富汗、黎凡特和非洲等正在为其提供资金，这意味着威胁可能发生。”2023年9月20日，法国内政部长达尔马宁在受访时警告，该国的恐袭风险可能死灰复燃。

;

;达尔马宁指出，目前主要的危险仍然来自法国本土的激进分子。这些人通常是在互联网上逐步激进化，他们极度孤立，乐于接受圣战宣传，响应仇恨号召。由于宗教激进化、模仿或精神脆弱等原因，他们使用非常有限的手段实施行动。

;

;同时，基地组织和“伊斯兰国”分支在一些地区重建。在萨赫勒地区，尤其是在黎凡特和阿富汗，毒品网络正在重建，并有可能为恐怖主义提供资金。

;

;“有了钱，这些组织就可以通过渗透移民潮等方式，就地培训圣战分子。就像2015 年11 月13 日袭击事件中的一些行凶者一样。他们还可以远程培训其他人。”达尔马宁说。

;

;;罩袍禁令;;拉锯战;

;

;据法国BFMTV 9月15日报道，该恐怖组织呼吁“让穆斯林儿童独处”“在父母的保护下成长”。这段文字，加上针对“巴黎某个部级政府部门”的威胁，暗示基地组织指的是与最近法国国内的“Abaya禁令”相关。

;

;“很难不把它与最近法国学校禁止穿Abaya联系起来，尽管根本没有提到这一点。”报道称。

;

;阿巴雅（Abaya）是一种宽松的长袍，可以遮罩女性身体曲线。在法国学校中，常常可以看到女性穆斯林学生穿着阿巴雅上学。

;

;2023年8月末，法国政府以政教分离原则为由，禁止学生穿这种有着明显宗教标志的服装。据教育部门指令，9月开学时，穿阿巴雅到校的学生禁止进入课室，之后由校方向她们“解释禁令的意义所在”。

;

;法国总统马克龙在此项问题上强调，政府在这个关系世俗主义原则的问题上“绝不让步”。他表示，“我们知道会有违规的情况出现……有些或许只出于一时疏忽，但相当一部分是想要挑战共和价值。我们决不能妥协。”

;

;尽管法国政府就禁令表现出了强硬姿态，但依然有穆斯林学生身穿罩袍到校。

;

;据法国教育部统计，9月4日开学时，全国有298名学生穿着罩袍上学，其中只有67名学生坚持不愿脱掉罩袍。

;

;当地时间9月7日，法国克莱蒙费朗高中一名女孩因坚持穿着罩袍上学而被禁止入校。随后，女孩父亲向校长发出了“割喉”死亡威胁。校长报警后，该名家长当晚被警方扣留。

;

;除了学生群体外，也有很多穆斯林支持者以多种方式反对“罩袍禁令”。

;

;法国政府颁布禁令后，包括巴黎南方教育协会在内的三家机构提出上诉，他们要求中止禁令，称禁令违反了“基本自由”。

;

;2023年9月19日，十多名穆斯林女性聚集在法国驻奥地利大使馆门外，就阿巴雅禁令对法国穆斯林妇女表示声援。在线传播的抗议视频中可以看到，一位身穿橘色长袍、头戴头巾的女性高举抗议标牌，上面写着“Abaya，我们的身份，我们的权利”。

;

;“法国的穆斯林政策，其实是其针对所有族群公民基本要求的组成部分。”上海外国语大学中东研究所研究员钮松告诉南方周末记者，就宗教服饰而言，其所涉及的也不只是头巾问题，其他宗教包括基督教的相关服饰或标志也在限制之列。

;

;“换言之，法国在公共领域对于宗教服饰、标志的限制，并不是针对特定的宗教，但宗教信仰者的抗争也一直伴随着政策推行的过程。即便是法国社会内部，也存在着对共和同化与政教分离原则的理解和执行方法上的不同看法。总之，围绕头巾、abaya服装的激烈对抗不仅撕裂了法国社会，而且也必然激怒保守的穆斯林群体。”钮松说。

;

;争论持续多日后，法国最高法院9月25日作出裁定，政府对穆斯林服饰长袍的禁令是“合乎法律”的。

;

;;为什么;;总;;是法国？ ;

;

;2015-2016年，法国巴塔克兰音乐厅枪击案、《查理周刊》袭击案等接连发生，暴力恐怖袭击愈演愈烈。

;

;2016年7月14日，造成至少84人死亡的“尼斯海岸恐袭案”发生后，英国安全智库“现实主义研究地缘政治与安全中心（CGSRS）”刊发名为《为什么总是法国》的报告，试图分析法国境内恐袭高发的内在逻辑。

;

;报告称，虽然其他欧洲国家也经历过恐怖主义，但是“法国正在呈现出一种明显的模式”“受到的影响尤为严重”。同时，虽然袭击者宣称“效忠极端组织”，但大多数人都是年轻的法国公民，且呈现小团体式活动。

;

;为什么法国成为本土伊斯兰恐怖主义如此突出的目标？报告对此作出了多个解释。

;

;首先是外交政策。报告称，法国长期以来一直干预穆斯林世界，特别是中东和北非（MENA）地区。因而伊斯兰主义者经常把法国视为“合法目标”。

;

;其次，法国人口构成增加了伊斯兰恐怖袭击的可能性，比如7%-9%的人口是穆斯林，远高于德国或英国等其他欧洲大国。

;

;此外，来自中东和北非地区的移民缺少流动机会，长期生活在贫困之中，由此带来对法国本土人民和机构的“不信任和仇恨”。最后，法国有着悠久的世俗主义传统，许多公民对任何形式的宗教都持非常消极的看法。这让一些穆斯林群体感到宗教自由受到了攻击。

;

;对于法国缘何被极端组织“盯上”，多名中国国际关系学者也向南方周末记者作出解释。

;

;钮松认为，在西方阵营内部，法国针对多元族群和信仰群体的态度较为“严苛”，强调族群平等并捍卫世俗化原则，不允许宗教元素在公共领域过分展示。因此，围绕头巾问题、abaya服饰问题等所产生的矛盾与冲突便会周期性呈现。

;

;此外，外来移民、难民与欧洲社会存在着结构性矛盾，这既包括经济实力上的显著差距，更包括文明背景上的迥异。德国与意大利等国对穆斯林移民的态度与政策相对温和，而法国因其严格的世俗化政策而更容易在宗教服饰等问题上激化早已累积的矛盾，并因问题的涉教性而难有回旋余地。法国自然成为恐怖组织在欧洲展开袭击的“优先”选项。

;

;中国人民大学国际事务研究所所长王义桅告诉南方周末记者，法国是近代欧洲文明的发源地。法国大革命的自由、平等、博爱理念影响了整个欧洲。但是，自由的泛滥也带来了对其他文明的冒犯，这会引起保守主义者的不满。同时，法国穆斯林人口众多，针对外部穆斯林世界的行为也会引起内部的反弹。

;

;正如《为什么总是法国》报告中预测，“由于问题的复杂性和深度，法国未来可能面临更多恐怖袭击”。

;

;;“;;这;;不是新鲜事;;”;

;

;除了法国外，瑞典也是这场“恐袭预告”中的袭击对象。这与瑞典国内数月来激进主义者焚烧经书风波有关。

;

;自2023年6月起，瑞典多地发生焚烧、亵渎伊斯兰宗教典籍事件，主要参与者为伊拉克难民萨尔万·莫米卡（Salwan Momika）和萨尔万·纳吉姆（Salwan Najem）。

;

;二人多次公开反对伊斯兰宗教典籍《古兰经》，并举行示威活动。

;

;其实，在这次“恐袭预告”之前，瑞典就因“烧经”事件被其他极端组织“点名”恐吓。

;

;2023年8月，基地组织媒体平台“As-Sahab 媒体基金会”（The As-Sahab Media Foundation）在一份题为“攻击侵略民族的义务”的公告中呼吁，对丹麦和瑞典在过去几个月中发生的焚烧经书行为展开“报复”。

;

;8月13日，英国外交部发布出行警告，称瑞典很有可能发生袭击事件，其安全当局已挫败了多起袭击企图。中国驻瑞典使馆也提醒，中国公民应关注瑞典当前安全形势变化，提高安全意识，保持高度警惕，加强安全防范。

;

;8月17日，瑞典将该国恐怖主义威胁等级从3级提升至4级“高威胁状态”，这是2016年以来的首次。

;

;瑞典当局称，这一决定是基于瑞典安全形势不断恶化而作出的“综合性、长期性和战略性判断”。此后，瑞典多个部门在边境、机场、公共交通等多领域加强安全措施。

;

;对于瑞典遇到的“恐袭威胁”，英国国王学院瑞典恐怖主义研究员汉斯·布鲁恩（Hans Brun）认为，这些威胁“并不是新鲜事”，没那么重要。

;

;他告诉瑞典TT新闻社，“你可以把它看作是对个人行动的号召。如果这是他们自己组织的，他们就不会这样提前宣布。你还应该记住，基地组织如今已被大大削弱。”

;

;布鲁恩表示，基地组织的声明不会影响整体安全局势，最大的影响可能是在中东工作的丹麦和瑞典外交官，他们可能需要采取额外的预防措施。

;

;布鲁恩的“预言”并非空穴来风。

;

;2023年7月，激进分子在瑞典首都斯德哥尔摩一座清真寺外焚烧经书后，伊拉克抗议者冲进瑞典驻伊大使馆，驱逐了大使并烧毁了使馆。伊拉克总理苏达尼甚至因此驱逐了瑞典大使，并暂停了瑞典电信公司爱立信的工作许可。

;

;截至目前，瑞典政府正在寻求法律手段限制近日来愈演愈烈的经书焚烧事件，以缓和与伊斯兰国家的紧张关系。然而，支持者们则提出，这可能违反该国宪法。

;

;;“;;他们会采取行动吗？;;”;

;

;自2023年9月8日橄榄球世界杯开幕以来，法国一直在举办大型活动，包括查尔斯三世国王来访、教皇来访等，而这些活动将一直持续到2024年巴黎奥运会。正如法国内政部长达尔马宁在受访时感慨，“恐怖主义风险很高，重大事件接踵而至”。

;

;达尔马宁表示，为了做好奥运会安保，法国已经增加了14000名警察和宪兵，并与多个部门合作，以应对不同的风险。 “我们已经为此努力了两年。”达尔马宁说。

;

;伴随着恐袭预告的发出，不少民众担心极端组织是否会付诸行动。

;

;法国情报研究中心副主任阿兰-罗迪埃在接受BFMTV采访时称，阿拉伯半岛基地组织威胁《查理周刊》两年后才采取行动，“这表明基地组织有能力等待”“当他们发出威胁时，随后往往会采取行动”。

;

;9月28日，南方周末记者通过邮件联系到阿兰-罗迪埃，他透露了该组织的诸多细节。

;

;阿兰-罗迪埃表示，2013年，阿拉伯半岛基地组织通过线上出版物《Inspire》公布了11名“通缉人物”，其中包括《查理周刊》漫画家斯特凡·沙邦尼尔(Stéphan·Charbonnier）。

;

;两年后，两名自称来自基地组织的恐怖分子谢里夫·库阿奇(Cherif Kouachi) 和赛义德·库阿奇(Saïd Kouachi) 兄弟袭击了《查理周刊》，导致包括周刊主编在内的至少12人死亡，多人受伤。而肇事者之一赛义德曾于2011年在也门接受了军事式训练。

;

;阿兰-罗迪埃认为，自2015年袭击事件以来，极端组织发起的圣战运动似乎不再把西方国家作为直接目标，而是“通过广告招募”。

;

;“这些组织似乎没有足够的手段派遣活动分子到欧洲实施恐怖行动。我们必须确保他们的演讲不会被内生的恐怖分子所利用。”阿兰-罗迪埃说。

;

;上海外国语大学中东研究所钮松认为，在全球协同反恐的攻势之下，基地组织的影响力大不如以前，但其仍具有实施暴力恐怖主义袭击的动机与能力。因此，此次基地组织威胁对法国与瑞典展开袭击仍不可掉以轻心。

;

;钮松表示，事实上，包括法瑞在内的国际社会一直对基地组织的当前动向和活动能力保持高度关注和应有的警惕，不会对其口头威胁无动于衷。

;

;也有人对这场恐袭预告持怀疑态度。

;

;法国苏凡中心(Soufan Center)资深研究员瓦西姆·纳斯尔在接受法国《观点》杂志（Le Point）采访时呼吁，民众应该保持理性，“恐慌的时刻还没有到来”。

;

;他认为，该杂志内容共17页，重点关注也门，对瑞典和法国的威胁只出现在第14页。 “威胁当然存在，我们必须认真对待它，但目前没有理由更加恐慌。”纳斯尔说。

;

; Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:25:02 +0800 巴赫：国际奥委会正考虑创办奥林匹克电子竞技运动会http://www.infzm.com/contents/258672
;;2023-10-16 14:00:00;
;

;电竞能否入奥，或许不久将有一个新的答案。国际奥委会主席巴赫14日晚在这里透露，国际奥委会正在考虑创办属于电子竞技的奥林匹克运动会。

;

;巴赫是在当晚举行的国际奥委会第141次全会开幕式上致辞时作上述表示的。他说：“我已经要求新的国际奥委会电子竞技委员会研究创办奥林匹克电子竞技运动会。”

;

;;;;

;

;据统计，全球有约30亿人玩电子游戏，其中超过5亿人对电子竞技特别感兴趣，包括虚拟体育和模拟体育，他们当中的大部分为34岁以下的年轻人。巴赫表示，这一点让国际奥委会非常看重，因此自2018年以来，国际奥委会一直以全方位的姿态介入电子竞技项目的发展。

;

;巴赫说：“我们选择了一种方式，让我们既能活跃在电子竞技领域，又能忠实于一个多世纪以来我们所遵循的价值观。在电子竞技领域，价值观一直是我们不会逾越的红线。我们清晰的立场也赢得了电竞界越来越多的尊重。为了符合奥林匹克价值观，一家行业内领先的发行商对他们的一款热门游戏重新进行设计——这样玩家就可以射击目标，而不是人。”

;

;2021年，国际奥委会举办奥林匹克虚拟系列赛。这是国际奥委会在电子竞技领域的首个试点项目。基于奥林匹克虚拟系列赛的成功经验，国际奥委会在今年又举办了首届奥林匹克电子竞技周，结果大受欢迎——包括预选赛在内，电子竞技系列赛吸引了超过50万名参与者，比赛在所有频道上的直播浏览量超过600万。

;

;巴赫说：“这是一个充满希望的开始，但这仅仅是一个开始。就像在任何运动中一样，即使在一个充满希望的开始之后，真正的比赛仍然在前面。”

;

;巴赫在当晚的致辞中还谈到了人工智能，他说:“我们的持续成功取决于我们如何拥抱不断加速发展的数字技术，特别是人工智能。这使得我们的《奥林匹克2020议程》更加紧迫——'要么改变，要么被改变'。”

;

;巴赫强调，国际奥委会必须掌握主动权，“我们必须对人工智能的机遇和风险进行全面分析，然后立即采取行动。我很高兴地告诉你们，这项工作已经在进行中。如果事情进展顺利，你们可能会在巴黎（奥运会）看到一些初步的结果”。

;

;国际奥委会第141次全会将持续至17日。此次全会的主要议程包括就《奥林匹克宪章》修正案以及2028年洛杉矶奥运会的项目设置进行表决，选举产生若干名新的国际奥委会委员。此外，全会将对《奥林匹克2020+5议程》的中期实施情况进行评估，并听取2024年巴黎奥运会、2028年洛杉矶奥运会、2032年布里斯班奥运会、2026年米兰-科尔蒂纳丹佩佐冬奥会以及未来两届青奥会筹备工作进展的报告。
